# init(gain:)

**Initializer**

Configure the behavior of an ambient audio source.

## Declaration

```swift
init(gain: Audio.Decibel = .zero)
```

## Parameters

- **gain**: The overall level for all sounds emitted from an entity.
title: init(gain:)
